bibl.title: Callimachus and the Bishops: Gregory of Nazianzus's Second Oration.
bibl.note: 1. Oration 2.9 and Callimachean poetics [in part. the prologue of the Aetia]. - 2. Oration 2.9 and Rufinus's translation. - Conclusions. - Avec résumé en anglais.
